INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_PERSONNEL_DTL (NUM_NAT_JOB_ID, STR_EMP_NO, GNUM_SLNO_MAIN, GNUM_SALUTATION_ID, STR_FIRST_NAME, STR_MIDDLE_NAME, STR_LAST_NAME, STR_GENDER_NAME, DT_BIRTH_DATE, STR_BIRTH_PLACE, NUM_HEIGHT, NUM_WEIGHT, STR_PHYSICAL_MARK, NUM_MARITAL_ID, NUM_BLOODG_ID, NUM_CASTE_ID, NUM_LANG_ID, NUM_RELIGION_ID, NUM_COUNTRY_ID, STR_PREGNANT, STR_MINORITY_COM, STR_PHYSICL_HANDI, NUM_PERCENT_HANDICAP, STR_TYPE_HANDICAP, STR_PAN_NO, STR_PHOTO_LOC, STR_SIG_LOC, STR_THUMBS_LOC, STR_VALIDATE, DT_VALIDATE_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_EMP_PERSONNEL_DTL SET NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?, STR_VALIDATE=?, DT_VALIDATE_DATE=?, STR_VALIDATE_NAME=?, STR_REMARKS=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE STR_EMP_NO=? and GNUM_SLNO_MAIN=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO gblt_user_mst (gnum_userid, gstr_user_name, gstr_password, psrstr_emp_no, gnum_user_seatid, gdt_effect_date, gnum_user_type, gnum_userlevel, gstr_status_code, gnum_seat_id, gdt_entry_date,GDT_EXPIRY_DATE, gnum_isvalid, gnum_designation, gstr_usr_name, gnum_hospital_code ) VALUES ((select max(gnum_userid)+1 from GBLT_USER_MST), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,? )
